section: Outro - Takeaway and Call to Action

scenes.text: Don't try to change your entire life tonight.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a standing cartoon person on the left side of the frame, head shaking with motion lines, both hands raised with palms out in a 'stop' gesture. On the right side, a tall unstable pile of five rectangular blocks stacked on top of each other, labeled from bottom to top: 'DIET', 'EXERCISE', 'SLEEP', 'WORK', 'HABITS'. The pile tilts slightly to one side. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a cartoon person lying flat on the ground in the center of the frame, face down, arms sprawled out, defeated posture. The five rectangular blocks labeled 'DIET', 'EXERCISE', 'SLEEP', 'WORK', 'HABITS' are scattered around the fallen person. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: They try to fix everything at once.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a cartoon person in the center of the frame, arms stretched out in all directions, panicked expression on face, eyes wide. Five balls arranged in an arc above the person, each falling downward with motion lines: labeled 'DIET', 'EXERCISE', 'SLEEP', 'WORK', 'HABITS'. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
On a black background, the word 'IDIOTS' in large bold white text centered in the frame. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Instead, design one tiny rule that changes your tomorrow.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a cartoon person on the left side of the frame, kneeling down carefully, placing one small white block labeled 'ONE RULE' on the ground with both hands. On the right side, a calendar page showing the word 'TOMORROW' with an arrow pointing toward it from the block. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
On a black background, a single hand in the center of the frame with index finger pointing upward. The number '1' in large white text floats beside the finger. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Pick one task you've been avoiding.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a cartoon person on the left side of the frame, arm extended forward, index finger pointing at one specific icon. Five task icons arranged in a horizontal row on the right: a book, a dumbbell, a phone, a document, a clock. The middle icon (phone) has a white circle around it indicating selection, the other four icons are faded. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a round analog clock face centered in the frame, white outline with hour and minute hands pointing to 7:00. Below the clock, the text 'TIME' in white. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
On a black background, a location pin icon centered in the frame, white outline with a dot in the center. Below the pin, the text 'PLACE' in white. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a rectangular button icon centered in the frame, white outline with the text 'START' inside. Below the button, the text 'TRIGGER' in white. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Write it down: If X, then Y.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a white rectangular piece of paper centered in the frame. On the paper, handwritten text reads 'IF X â†’ THEN Y' in black. A pen rests at the bottom right corner of the paper. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a cartoon person on the left side of the frame, kneeling down, both hands placing a block on top of a stack. Three rectangular blocks stacked in the center, labeled from bottom to top: 'TRIGGER', 'ROUTINE', 'REWARD'. The person has a focused determined expression. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Those systems will build the right you.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, the three rectangular blocks labeled 'TRIGGER', 'ROUTINE', 'REWARD' stacked on the left side of the frame. A white arrow extends from the stack pointing right toward a cartoon person on the right side of the frame, standing tall with confident posture, shoulders back, slight smile, small sparkles around the figure. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a standing cartoon person centered in the frame, leaning slightly forward, one eyebrow raised, right hand raised with index finger pointing upward. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: You can build all the systems you want, but if you're slow at learning the skills you actually need to make those systems work, what's the point?
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a cartoon person in the center of the frame, confused expression on face, scratching head with one hand. On the left side, the three stacked blocks labeled 'TRIGGER', 'ROUTINE', 'REWARD'. On the right side, a large white question mark. Between the person and the blocks, a white X indicating disconnection. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Most people set up perfect routines then take months to learn what others learn in days.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a split scene divided by a vertical white dashed line. Left side: a cartoon person with slumped tired posture, a calendar page above showing 'MONTHS' in white text, labeled 'SLOW' below. Right side: a cartoon person standing confidently with satisfied expression, a calendar page above showing 'DAYS' in white text, labeled 'FAST' below. Simple cartoon style with clean lines, consistent character design across both sides.
On a black background, the word 'IDIOTS' in large bold white text centered in the frame. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: That's why I made this video breaking down exactly how to learn anything so fast it's almost unfair.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a rectangular video thumbnail centered in the frame with white outline. Inside the thumbnail, the text 'HOW TO LEARN FAST' in white. A triangular play button icon in the center of the thumbnail. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a cartoon person on the left side of the frame, arm fully extended forward, index finger pointing directly at the viewer, encouraging expression with slight smile. On the right side, a white arrow pointing right with the word 'NEXT' in white text below it. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
